nvm_cfstore.help: Use cfstore as a NVM storage. Else RAM simulation will be used

critical-section-usable-from-interrupt.help: Make critical section API usable from interrupt context. Else a mutex is used as locking primitive. Consult arm_hal_interrupt.c for possible side effects on interrupt latency.

event-loop-dispatch-from-application.help: Application is responsible of message dispatch loop. Else launch a separate thread for event-loop.

event-loop-use-mbed-events.help: Use Mbed OS global event queue for Nanostack event loop, rather than our own thread.
